definition: erhua variant of 女孩[nu:3 hai2]

sentences.english: A three-year-old girl is now a new living goddess in Nepal.
sentences.chinese: 一名三歲女孩，現在是一個新的活女神在尼泊爾。

sentences.english: The girl threaded the needle for her mother.
One of the girls she rescued from a pimp later graduated from high school as valedictorian.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個她所救的女孩之後在高中畢業典禮上致辭。

sentences.english: Those two girls do their hair in the same way.
sentences.chinese: 那兩個女孩把頭髮梳成相同的式樣。

sentences.english: She is also a dynamic and sporty girls.
sentences.chinese: 她也是一位具有活力的運動型女孩。

sentences.english: Zhao Min is a Chinese girl.
sentences.chinese: 趙敏是一箇中國女孩，她今年13歲。

sentences.english: Today girls are going for the women's individual all-around final.
sentences.chinese: 今天女孩子們要爲個人全能拼搏了。

sentences.english: I is a traditional Chinese girl with the marriage.
sentences.chinese: 我是個具有傳統婚姻觀的中國女孩。

sentences.english: Boys and girls go out together from an early age.
sentences.chinese: 美國的男孩和女孩從小就可以一塊出去玩。

sentences.english: A frend is going to visit a girl you know well.
sentences.chinese: 一個朋友正準備去看望你很熟悉的一個女孩子。

sentences.english: I heard that when a group of girls tried to escape, they locked them in the rooms and beat them up.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說有一羣女孩試着逃走，被他們鎖在屋子裏狠揍。

sentences.english: In the moment and again the flash across is that girl's face, Qiong's eventually preoccupied of her is who.
sentences.chinese: 眼前再次閃過那個女孩的臉，瓊終於想起了她是誰。

sentences.english: It is useless for a girl to quarrel with fate because she is not a boy.
sentences.chinese: 女孩子因自己非男孩而自怨命苦是無用的。

sentences.english: Then he looked up and saw the girl at the top of the pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 然後他向上看，看到了寶塔頂端的女孩。

sentences.english: Another 9-year old girl died after being admitted to hospital.
sentences.chinese: 另外一名年僅9歲的小女孩在被送入醫院後不治。

definition: erhua variant of 女孩[nu:3 hai2]
erhua variant of 男孩[nan2 hai2]
